channel.title: Summoning in the quest tab
channel.description:
my music tab is being used my construction so i cannot put summoning there can anybody give me a link to a TUT or tell me how
i have summoning in my project 16 source but i now use freescape so what would i need to add or change
(my con doesnt save and goes away after u log, can i make it save and alos add a remove option, but so the remove option only works for the player who build it)
in other words
(i need to make my con save and add a remove option for the player who owns the house)
